member.name: T:Ellucian.Colleague.Configuration.ApplicationServerConfigurationManager
member.summary: Provides a synchronized interface to the IIS Runtime Cache. In addition, the validation of the Application Server settings is handled here. Centralizing this configuration information simplifies the implementation and provides a single class for future caching needs.

member.name: T:Ellucian.Colleague.Configuration.IApplicationServerConnection
member.summary: This interface provides a means of communicating with the Colleague Application Server. This interface extends IDisposable in order to clean up the streams more efficiently.

member.name: M:Ellucian.Colleague.Configuration.IApplicationServerConnection.Connect
member.summary: This method establishes the connection to the Colleague Application Server

member.name: M:Ellucian.Colleague.Configuration.IApplicationServerConnection.ConnectAsync
member.summary: This method establishes the connection to the Colleague Application Server as an asynchronous operation

member.name: M:Ellucian.Colleague.Configuration.IApplicationServerConnection.SendBytes(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Sends a DMI request.
member.param: Request to send in the format of a Byte array.

member.name: M:Ellucian.Colleague.Configuration.IApplicationServerConnection.SendBytesAsync(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Sends a DMI request as an asynchronous transaction.
member.param: Request to send in the format of a Byte array.

member.name: M:Ellucian.Colleague.Configuration.IApplicationServerConnection.SendRequest(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: This method sends a stream of data to the Colleague Application Server

member.name: M:Ellucian.Colleague.Configuration.IApplicationServerConnection.SendRequestAsync(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: This method sends a stream of data to the Colleague Application Server as an asynchronous operation

member.name: M:Ellucian.Colleague.Configuration.IApplicationServerConnection.ReceiveStringResponse
member.summary: Receives the DMI response as a string.

member.name: M:Ellucian.Colleague.Configuration.IApplicationServerConnection.ReceiveStringResponseAsync
member.summary: Receives the DMI response as a string as an asynchronous operation.

member.name: M:Ellucian.Colleague.Configuration.IApplicationServerConnection.ReceiveResponse
member.summary: This method receive a Colleague Application Server response and converts it to a Stream

member.name: M:Ellucian.Colleague.Configuration.IApplicationServerConnection.ReceiveResponseAsync
member.summary: This method receive a Colleague Application Server response as an asynchronous operation and converts it to a Stream

member.name: M:Ellucian.Colleague.Configuration.IApplicationServerConnection.Disconnect
member.summary: This method destroys the connection to the Colleague Application Server

member.name: M:Ellucian.Colleague.Configuration.IApplicationServerConnection.DisconnectAsync
member.summary: This method destroys the connection to the Colleague Application Server as an asynchronous operation

member.name: M:Ellucian.Colleague.Configuration.IApplicationServerConnection.DoSendRawBytesAsync(System.Byte[])
member.summary: This method writes the byte array as is to the stream

member.name: M:Ellucian.Colleague.Configuration.IApplicationServerConnection.DoReceiveRawBytesAsync(System.Byte[])
member.summary: This method read raw bytes from the stream. How much is read is determined by the parameter's size.

member.name: M:Ellucian.Colleague.Configuration.IApplicationServerConnection.WriteStringToStreamAsync(System.String)
member.summary: This method writes the string message to the stream.

member.name: M:Ellucian.Colleague.Configuration.IApplicationServerConnection.ReadStringFromStreamAsync(System.Int64)
member.summary: This method reads the bytes as string from the stream. How much is read is determined by the parameter's size.

member.summary: This method resets the DMI socket connection

member.name: M:Ellucian.Colleague.Configuration.IApplicationServerConnection.ResetConnectionAsync
member.summary: This method resets the DMI socket connection asynchronously

member.summary: Refresh the licensing information using a specified path.

member.name: M:Ellucian.Colleague.Configuration.Licensing.EllucianLicenseProvider.GetLicense(System.ComponentModel.LicenseContext,System.Type,System.Object,System.Boolean)
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, gets a license for an instance or type of component. When given a context and whether the denial of a license, throws an exception.
member.param: A that specifies where you can use the licensed object.
A that represents the component requesting the license.
An object that is requesting the license.
true if a should be thrown when the component cannot be granted a license; otherwise, false.

member.name: T:Ellucian.Colleague.Configuration.ServerConfigurationDefinition
member.summary: Represents the "applicationServer" section within a web application configuration file (app.config or web.config) under the "datatel" section. This node has all of the required attributes for simplicity and there is currently a 1-to-1 mapping between a web application deployment and the environment. Validation occurs outside of this class so the exceptions can be caught and handled appropriately.

member.name: M:Ellucian.Colleague.Configuration.ServerConfigurationDefinition.#ctor
member.summary: Default Constructor

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Configuration.ServerConfigurationDefinition.Settings
member.summary: Represents the name of the settings stored in Colleague.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Configuration.ServerConfigurationDefinition.Environment
member.summary: Represents the name of the Colleague environment.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Configuration.ServerConfigurationDefinition.Address
member.summary: Represents the IP address or host name of the Colleague Application Server.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Configuration.ServerConfigurationDefinition.Port
member.summary: Represents the port number of the Colleague Application Server.

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Configuration.ServerConfigurationDefinition.Secure
member.summary: Read-only boolean property that determines if the secure flag was set in the configuration

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Configuration.ServerConfigurationDefinition.SecureFlag
member.summary: Determines the security setting when connecting to the Colleague Application Server

member.name: P:Ellucian.Colleague.Configuration.ServerConfigurationDefinition.CertificateHostnameOverride
member.summary: Represents the certificate host name override the Colleague Application Server. This is useful when the external and internal host names do not match.
